हाज़िरी Register हाज़िरीRegister हाज़िरीRegister Password User Id Login Forgot Password You are Specially chosen person you are allowed to add mutiple Work Site . You have to Add your Work Site here . Register Swap Admin//no Select Designation//no Mobile Number Full Name Send Otp Verify Otp Select Team Member for Swapping//no " User"//no Submit Welcome //no Profile //no Role //no REGISTER YOUR SELF Company or your name //no Language //no Team Size About //no Create a Password Re-Enter the password Add Site//no Your Team Member//no + Work Site Add New Skilled Worker Short Name Address Work Site Register Labour Name of Labour Father's Name Mobile/Any Id Number Enter Wages Company * WEBSITE Email * Address * Submit Add Skilled Worker Add UnSkilled Worker Man Power MANPOWER STATUS Work Site Site Id Team Member FORCE LOGOUT SKILLED UN-SKILLED Supervisor View Unskilled Worker Master Data Sheet View Skilled Worker Master Data Sheet Add a new worker Attendance Hi -- You are an Site Created Date Site Created Date You have to freeze site working hours below and can be modified as per your requirement. Start Time End Time Cash in Hand Show today's payment List Show custom payment list Proceed to advances pay Today's Custom Show Message Download Report Account Not Created? LET'S BEGIN Attendance for Tap Mic and Speak Approve Labours from the list Mark Present Labour List Total Workers: No Labour Marked Pesent Upload Payment Details Search Result Payment Count: Payment Sum: Message Display Search for Labour from list Search Worker No Workers To show Scroll to view full list For Uploading Click Here From To Team Member List Add Team Member Attendance -Skilled Labour Attendance -UnSkilled Labour Show Uploaded Attendance WORK SITE SITE ID SKILLED MASTER DATA UN-SKILLED ATTENDENCE VIEW ALL ATTENDENCE DOWNLOAD ATTENDENCE FUND REQUEST ADVANCES Get Compile List Before you start your activity,
 You need to Verify the site Location
 Click on the button below to automatically detect the location. Detect location Location Successfully detected City Lucknow Pin Code 226016 Submit Details Company : Site Nick Name Site Address You can change site working hours below and can be modified as per your requirement. Site Start Time Site End Time Update Master Data Sheet for Site Location Updated Successfully Cash Time Left for Forced Logout Home Resend OTP Hii: Its now your turn to be Team Member " Its now your turn to be Admin" START * Required company assigns You Team Member for Hajiri Register App.You have Successfully Registered. Start your day with your user Id and Password on Haajiri Register Start your day with your USERID and password LETS WORK Name Mobile Designation Status Location Invite Team Member Add new Skilled Worker Add new Unskilled Worker Master Data-Sheet Add New Worker Report Timeline Reports Requests Swap Site Admin Cash/Pending Rqst. Pending Rqst. * Download Report is a paid feature of this app. On clicking download you will be redirected to Payment Gateway page. View Attendance Report Download Advances Report Compiled Report Select Worker Type Language Select App Language English Hindi Change Language Language Change Successful Already a user? Please wait Request Status Allow Full Amount Allow Partial Amount Deny Request Enter Amt Your fund request of is accepted.On fund received, it should be entered in Cash Receiving tab. is denied. is on hold. Receiving Expenses PAYMENT You have not uploaded any attendance for today You have not made any payment for today Are you sure you want to exit? Exit Yes No Take a selfie at work site Upload Selefie Registered Invite Team Member Log Out Are you sure you want to log out? This is a read only column. Can't be edited!!! Error Coming Soon Site Deletion Feature will be added very soon OK Confirm Are you sure You have checked the site details correctly? Force Logout Reason Force Logout Time Allow Deny You have been forced logout due to not completed Attendance Activity in due time. Contact your Site Admin to login again. Are you Sure you want to Upload? Once uploaded you cannot change the data!! Confirmation You have Entered Rs: . Are you sure you want to proceed with request?? Request made successfully Success Your request is successfuly made and Request Id is : Grant Permission This app needs permission to use Camera And Storage. You can grant them in app settings. GOTO SETTINGS added successfully Skilled worker with worker Id Unskilled worker with id Language Change Successfully. You have been forced logout due to not login in due time. Contact your site admin to login again. Attendance Uploaded Successful Sr No Father's Name Worker Id Type Wages Unique Id worker Image Loading.... You are an " You are an Team Member " Present Worker Request Fund Back to Home No request status to show Time Id Amt Proceed to upload Add more payments Proceed to check Amount: Remark: Enter Expense Amount here Submit Entry Required Fund: Received Fund: Received From: Submit Receiving Enter Amount here Enter Name Here WebSite (Optional) Latest Request Request Amount User Id Already Taken Enter User id Password cannot be Empty Password should be minimum of 6 characters Passwords Do not Match Please Enter the company Name Enter the company Address Enter Company Email Address Mobile Number Already Registered Name cannot be empty Invalid Mobile Number OTP cannot be empty Some Error Occurred Unable to detect Your Location Your Location is Turned Off. Incorrect Password UserId not Found You have been forced logout by site admin. Contact your site admin to re-login. Add another attendance Enter Req Amount Here Work Activity Take a picture of work Change picture Click an image to upload or enter comment Comment cannot be empty Activity updated You need to either upload a Activity Photo or enter a comment to finish upload.
 You can speak or type to enter a message in comment box Disclaimer Hajiri Register provides speech-to-text services through a third party.Hajiri Register does not control the results of texting with this speech-to-text feature. Hajiri Register advises you to check your end before you submit the text results
Date Details Select Site has been initiated. Registration will not be confirmed until Team Member will upload the photo of labour and confirm the registration Pending Labour Request There are Pending Labour Registration of this site. Confirm Details Take a photo of labour This is a read only column. To edit details click on edit button Edit Details updated successfully The worker registration is in Pending status and cannot be edited unless confirmed. The labour registration is in pending status. You need to confirm the registration details to take attendance Pending Insufficient balance.Unable to transact. Insufficient balance Do you wish to opt for Automatic Force Logout?? Yes(Automatic) No(Manual) Do you wish to opt for Automatic Work Activity?? Type to Search for Labour Company: You cannot more than 1 Team Member per site Site Activity Attendance Status Team Member Status Click on the site name to navigate to Site Activity Select Any one Work Option (Compulsary) Do you wish to take reporting of your site by appointing Team Member Know More Do you wish to do reporting of your site by yourself Do you wish to keep both the above options as per your convenience Day Book View Skilled View Unskilled Space is not allowed in userId Only special symbol _ allowed in userId Invalid User id rzp_live_jTwe6Kb0rTPIvI xWecxFYe9K71YGCPOwETjo6W ₹ Your file is just one click away.You need to make payment of to permanently download your fileा
Details Download File Type Selected Date Range Payable Amt Mode On clicking on Payment, you will be redirected to Razorpay payment gateway. In no circumstance हाजिरी Register will be responsible for failure or refund of payment. In no case payment is non- transferable and non-refundable. Pre Payment Details Apply Promo Code. Share Youtube Change Work Option Logout You have opted for Site Reporting with Team Member. Are you sure you wish to continue? You have opted for Site Reporting by self. Are you sure you wish to continue? You have opted for Site Reporting by self+ Team Member. Are you sure you wish to continue? Day Book List Site Details Updated Click on site name to perform Site activity Other Expenses Complete Site Name Work Date: Work Time Skip this step Warning You can skip this step for time being. But, it is mandatory to perform this action in next 36hours Sure Change Force Logout will start in Your Free Trial of force logout is complete. Force logout Timer will be activated on your next login Payment Successful Payment Id No Team Member is added to the site Attendance Uploaded Successful Your Transactions No Team Member is registered on this site वर्कर को सर्च करने के लिए बोले Worker with this name not found Payment Failed Failed Reason Payment Failed and file could not be generated Labours whom advances was paid Labour Id Login with another user id Are you sure you want to skip? You will be required to perform all the activities on site yourslef Skip Attendance Management Create Master Data and Take Attendance Expense Management Use Master Data and Pay Advances Cash Management Fund Request and Fund Receiving This is mandatory for all Team Member Expense Cash Since you are adding more than one Team Member to the site. You need to distribute the powers to your different Team Member once the other Team Member complete his registration. Attendance List You do not have Authority to do this activity. Distribute Power Do you wish to use Another language? Select Team Member Edit Attendance You can edit attendance only once. After that no edit is allowed Make this site Inactive Make this site Active Are you sure you want to inactive this site along with added Team Members(if any)? Are you sure you want to make this site inactive. The members added if any cannot work on this site Block Unblock Are you sure you want to block this Team Member? Are you sure you want to unblock this Team Member? Edit Attendnace Enter Advance amount to proceed You cannot pay more than payable amount to labour There is already invited member in the list who has not Registered yet You cannot add more than 3 members on a single site "You can upload attendance only once for a single Day. " You can edit the attendance only before 1.5 hours before site end time you have You are blocked by Site Admin.Unable to Login You have been blocked by the Site Admin.Contact your site admin Reconcile BLOCKED Forgot Password? No Worries we will help you recover it Skip and Proceed To login An OTP will be sent to the registered mobile number of this user id Create a new password Your Remark/Reply Type to send a message Check Details Speak or Type your Remark Reply Not Allowed You are trying to reconcile a Received Cash by you. For this you need to take permission from Ask Permission You are trying to make a payment to labour more than the payable Amount till date. The app will seek permission from site admin to allow this action Cancel Site Admin wants to know the reason for your current request. Click here to update "Your request of entry of Reconcile amount of " is accepted "Your request to pay " Requested Paying Amount Requested Reconcile Amount Team Member Request Looging Out Invalid Amount Not Accepted Enter the reason Ask Why? Send Contact Us On blocking the Team Member you will be doing all the activities of the site You need to Re-distribute the power of Team Member you are blocking to other asscociates क्या आप सुनिश्चित हैं कि आप के साथ अपनी भूमिका की अदला-बदली करना चाहते हैं। स्वैप के बाद आप साइट के लिए सहयोगी के रूप में काम करेंगे और आपके सभी व्यवस्थापकीय अधिकार समाप्त कर दिए जाएंगे | Role Distributed Successfully अपनी टिप्पणी टाइप करें Have you Received the desctription of Other Expense Hold View Terms and Conditions To successfully apply power change app will logout all the Team Member added at the site. Do you want to proceed? Site Admin has changed your power/forced logout. To continue please login again Select Site to View Chats Skills Zoomers (“Company” or “We” or “Us” or “Our”),operates a web/mobile application “हाजिरीRegister” available on android based applications (“App”) and the App/Websites: (“App/Website”). The App and App/Website shall hereinafter together be referred to as the “Work Site” or “हाजिरीRegister”. You (hereinafter collectively referred to as “User(s)”/ “You”/ “Your”) may be accessing our Work Site from a computer or mobile phone device (through an Android application, for example) and these Terms of Use govern your use of our Work Site and your conduct, regardless of the means of access. By using the Work Site, you confirm that you accept these Terms of Use and that you agree to abide by them. Your use of the services and features of the Work Site shall be governed by these Terms and Conditions (hereinafter “Terms of Use”) along with the Privacy Policy, as modified and amended from time to time at our End. By merely accessing or using the Work Site, you are acknowledging, without limitation or qualification, to be bound by these Terms of Use and the Privacy Policies, whether you have read the same or not. ACCESSING, BROWSING OR OTHERWISE USING THE WORK SITE INDICATES YOUR UNCONDITIONAL AGREEMENT TO ALL THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS IN THIS AGREEMENT, SO PLEASE READ THIS AGREEMENT CAREFULLY BEFORE PROCEEDING. If you do not agree to any of the terms enumerated in the Terms of Use or the Policies, please do not use the Site. You are responsible to ensure that your access to this Site and material available on or through it are legal in each jurisdiction, in or through which you access or view the site or such material. You will need to sign-up with us by filling the sign-up form by providing your registered mobile number and other requisite information about yourself or your organization and open a हाजिरीRegister account (“Account”). As a registered user, you further agree to update your Personal Information (as defined in the Privacy Policy) if needed and to be solely and entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your user account, login and password and any activity that may occur through your Account. You must ensure that the information provided by You is correct, complete and not misleading. In the event, the information supplied by You is incorrect, incomplete and misleading, your registration may be cancelled and Your Account may be deactivated. हाजिरीRegister provides both free and paid services You will be required to make payment of subscription fees for the use of the advanced features available on the App. Under no circumstances shall the fees paid by You for the use of the paid features be refunded. The following payment options are available on the Site: Credit and debit cards •	Net banking/Direct Debit payments from banks in India. A list of available options will be made available at the time of the transaction. Payment Wallets UPI To successfully subscribe to the paid services, the User is required to complete the transaction by making the payment for the services opted for. The payment is also done within the App when the User is to download the Attendance Sheet, Payment Sheet and Compile Sheet through the Payment Gateway. Under no circumstance, the payment done for the details mentioned above will be refunded. Users should ensure that the instrument used to make the payment is his/her own. Users further understand and acknowledge the fact that हाजिरीRegister is not a bank, a financial institution, or a non-banking financial corporation. We maintain a nodal bank account for the services offered on the Site. All payment instructions made by Users are submitted to the nodal bank in order to effect the payment to other Users. It is the sole responsibility of the Users to administer and manage the online banking and financial transactions and payments made through the Site. Users are solely responsible for acquainting themselves with, and complying with, all applicable laws of India, including those pertaining to online payments and transfer of funds through online and offline methods. Users have to be sure that they are complying with the requirements and regulations as framed by Reserve Bank of India (RBI) from time to time and any online monetary transaction in violation of the rules and regulations prescribed by the RBI and other applicable laws of India shall be solely attributable to the concerned User and We shall not be held liable in this regard. You must ensure that the information/ documents provided by You on registration is correct, complete and not misleading. In case of any change in the information provided by You, You must promptly inform Us of such changes by updating Your details, so that We may communicate with You effectively. Refund of Subscription fee: The subscription fees paid for use of advanced features on the Site are non-refundable irrespective of whether the Services have been availed/ and or consumed. Your subscription plan will continue to remain active till the end of the subscription term and cancellation of the subscription will not be allowed during the subscription term. Only in cases of any fraudulent transactions and/or errors in transactions such as duplicity in payment and/or the incorrect amount charged, we may refund the subscription fee at our sole discretion post successful verification. Refund pertaining to transactions on the Site: We assume no responsibility and shall incur no liability in case of incorrect transactions and/or if हाजिरीRegister r is unable to process the payment instructions issued by You owing to one or more of the following reasons: Payment instructions issued by You including but not limited to the account number and UPI pin incomplete, inaccurate, invalid or delayed; If Your payment account has insufficient funds/limits to cover the amount mentioned in the payment instructions; If the funds available in your payment account are under any encumbrance or charge If your bank or the nodal bank refuses or delays honoring the payment instructions Occurrence of a Force Majeure Event Failure in the applicable bank or credit card service provider’s system or network. We provide a one-stop solution for Manpower attendance and payment of wages management for businesses. By using Our Site, users can avail of Manpower attendance and payment of wages processing services, manage their attendance, and cash flows and receive associated payment and attendance reports RESPONSIBILITIES Our Responsibilities towards the Users We will exercise reasonable skill and care with respect to the access of the Site by the Users. Although We have asked all users to use the Site responsibly, We cannot guarantee the accuracy, integrity or quality of any information You acknowledge and agree that We do not check or verify the details of any service bookings and do not guarantee the accuracy, integrity or quality of any information which is posted by third parties. It is hereby clarified that हाजिरीRegister shall incur no liability in cases of non-compliance with applicable state and central labour laws with respect to payroll processing and other services availed on the Site You agree to abide by the Terms of Use when using the Site. You shall be solely responsible for checking and verifying the details of any services accepted/ rendered on the Site by You and the terms of any support thereof. You shall be responsible for complying with all applicable laws including labor laws, local state and municipality laws and taxation regulations in Your dealings with other Users and for the performance and quality of any support which You agree to provide to/ receive from a User You agree not to impersonate any person or entity, falsely claim, or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity, or access the accounts of others without permission, misrepresent the source, identity, perform any similar fraudulent activity or otherwise avail Services with what that we reasonably believe to be potentially fraudulent funds. By registering as a User and by using the Site, You agree to indemnify and hold Us harmless from all costs, losses or claims which may result from any information You submit or transmit via the Site or from any support which You agree to provide to/ receive from any User. IMPERSONATION AND UNAUTHORISED DEALINGS PROHIBITED The Site does not tolerate any illegal and unauthorized activities on or against the Site by either Users or any unrelated third parties. All Users are absolutely prohibited from impersonating another person/User or deal in any other manner that is prohibited by the Laws of India and other Jurisdictions. If we have reasonable grounds to believe that a User has indulged in any prohibited activities or has committed any Crime or Cyber Crime, हाजिरीRegister may in its sole discretion, but without any legal obligation to do so, initiate appropriate legal proceedings against the offender as well as notify the same to any regulatory or law enforcement agency of India or Foreign Jurisdiction. हाजिरीRegister may also suspend or terminate the User’s account and other privileges for the use of the Site. CRIME AND CYBER CRIME REPORTING BY USERS USERNAME After successful registration on the Site, a username (“ID”) will be generated for the use of the Site by You, which You must keep confidential. You shall be solely responsible for preventing any unauthorized use of Your ID and notify Us in case any theft or unauthorized use of the ID takes place. We reserve the right to suspend and/ or block Your ID if the same is used in contravention of these Terms of Use. We are not responsible for changing / migrating the data from one User account to other USE OF SITE The Site allows the registered users to create, edit and submit necessary information including creating User profile, posting details pertaining to the employee(s). We do not seek to monitor or control the submission of information. However, We do reserve the right to delete, move and edit any material submitted where We consider it necessary to do so. You agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations when using the Site and are solely responsible for all the information You submit for inclusion or transmission. You must not post or transmit any material that(i) is fraudulent, dishonest or misleading; (ii) is unlawful, harassing, libelous, abusive, threatening, harmful, vulgar, obscene, or otherwise objectionable or breaches any law; (iii) encourages conduct that constitutes a criminal offence, gives rise to civil liability or otherwise breaches any applicable laws, regulations or code of practice; (iv) infringes the copyright or other rights of any third party; (v) is technically harmful (including, without limitation, computer viruses or other malicious software or harmful data). You grant Us a royalty-free, non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, modify, translate, make available and distribute the material for the purpose of operating the Site. ALERTS/NOTIFICATIONS We may from time to time provide automatic alerts/notifications and payment related alerts linked with Your Account on Site. Further, automatic alerts may be sent to you following certain changes to Your Account or information, such as changes in your registration information. By accepting the terms and conditions and/or using the Services, you accept that we may send the alerts to your registered mobile phone number, WhatsApp and through push notifications. Electronic alerts will be sent to the mobile number provided by you via SMS, push notifications or WhatsApp for the Services. If your mobile number changes, you are responsible for informing us of that change. You can also choose to have alerts sent to a mobile device that accepts text messages. Changes to mobile number will apply to all of your alerts We will make best efforts to provide the Service and it shall be deemed that you shall have received the information sent from us as an alert on your registered mobile phone number and we shall not be under any obligation to confirm the authenticity of the person(s) receiving the alert. You cannot hold us liable for non-availability of the service in any manner whatsoever. You further acknowledge that You shall have the obligation to inform us about any change in your mobile phone number or e-mail address. Alerts /notification will be sent to your new mobile number or e-mail address after registering and linking it with your Account. You acknowledge that the WhatsApp service or push notification or SMS provided by us is an additional facility provided for your convenience and that it may be susceptible to error, omission and/ or inaccuracy. In the event you observe any error in the information provided in the alert, you shall immediately inform us about the same. We will make best possible efforts to rectify the error as soon as possible. GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS You represent and warrant that you are an individual of legal age to form a binding contract (or if not, you’ve received your parent’s or guardian’s permission to use the Services and gotten your parent or guardian to agree to these Terms on your behalf). You may access and use the Site only for Your personal/business and lawful purposes in accordance with these Terms of Use. You agree not to access the Site by any means other than through the interface that is provided by Us. Additionally, You shall be responsible for complying with any laws, rules and regulations for the use of Our Site in Your jurisdiction. At हाजिरीRegister, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our Users. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by हाजिरीRegister and how we use it. This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for Users to our App/Website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in हाजिरीRegister. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this App/Website. By affirming your assent to this Privacy Policy, you provide your consent to such collection, use, storage, processing and disclosure as set out in this Privacy Policy and the Terms and Conditions. The information received by the App will not be shared with any third-party or third-party service providers for the purposes of advertising or marketing. हाजिरीRegister will only be using the information for providing Services to you.By accessing our services, you agree to this privacy policy. This document supersedes any prior communication on this topic and reflects the entire and exclusive policy for this service. You may choose to provide us with personal information through the Platform, like: Contact information, such as your name, address, telephone number and email address. Payment information of Workers , such as Per day wages / Per Month. Information obtained from the login Credential Password you created and use to log in to the Platform. Personal information in communications and other content you submit or share, such as photographs and video clips. If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide. Information We Collect By Automated Means If you use the Platform, we may collect the following information by automated means: The type of device you use and its operating system. When you install the App, we store the information we collect with unique identifiers tied to the device you are using. We collect information from the device when you download and install the App and explicitly seek permission from You to get the required information from the device. The information we collect from your device includes unique device identifiers like firebase Token for retrieving and sending notifications or in-app messaging services to uniquely identify the devices and ensure that no unauthorized device acts on your behalf to prevent fraud. Information about your use of the Platform. Location We don’t collect, read or store your personal SMS from your inbox. Camera Write Storage We require the camera information permission to provide you an easy/smooth experience and to enable you to click photos of your Staff Members /Work Team How we use your information We use the information we collect in various ways, including to: Provide, operate, and maintain our App/Website Improve, personalize, and expand our App/Website Understand and analyze how you use our App/Website Develop new products, services, features, and functionality Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the App/Website, and for marketing and promotional purposes Send you emails Send communications, notifications regarding the products, Subscription offerings, We do not disclose information about identifiable individuals to other parties, but we may provide them with anonymous aggregate information about our users (for example, we may inform them that X no. of subscriber are Individual —- Y no. of subscriber are Company .. etc. Find and prevent fraud We may de-identify personal information that we have collected from you through the Platform and combine it with de-identified information about other users, information from third parties, and/or publicly available information.Platform Visitor ship Information We gather information from the App/Website activity, such as data on the number of people who visit the Platform, the pages they visit, the duration of their stay, etc. Platform Visitor ship Information includes: Collected on an aggregate, anonymous basis, which means no personal identifiable information is associated with this data. Gathered through the use of web server logs and cookies. Log Files हाजिरीRegister follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log Users when they visit App/Websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services’ analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users’ movement on the App/Website, and gathering demographic information. Cookies and Web Beacons Like any other App/Website, हाजिरीRegister uses ‘cookies’. These cookies are used to store information including Users’ preferences, and the pages on the App/Website that the visitor accessed or visited. The information is used to optimize the users’ experience by customizing our web page content based on Users’ browser type and/or other information. We will use cookies on our App/Website similar to other lending App/Websites / apps and online marketplace App/Websites / apps. Use of this information helps Us identify You in order to make our App/Website more user friendly. Most browsers will permit You to decline cookies but if You choose to do this it might affect service on some parts of Our App/Website. If you choose to make a purchase through the Platform, we collect information about your buying behavior. We retain this information as necessary to resolve disputes, provide customer support and troubleshoot problems as permitted by law. if you send us personal correspondence, such as emails or letters, or if other users or third parties send us correspondence about your activities or postings on the App/Website, we collect such information into a file specific to you. Advertising Partners Privacy Policies You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of हाजिरीRegister.Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on हाजिरीRegister, which are sent directly to users’ browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on App/Websites that you visit.Note that हाजिरीRegister has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers. Third Party Privacy Policies हाजिरीRegister’s Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or App/Websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers’ respective App/Websites. CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information) Under the CPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:Request that a business that collects a consumer’s personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.Request that a business that sells a consumer’s personal data, not sell the consumer’s personal data.If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us. GDPR Data Protection Rights We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service. The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete. The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions. The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions. The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions. The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions. If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us. Children’s Information Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity. हाजिरीRegister does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our App/Website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records. If you have additional questions or require more information about our T and C . Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact via hajiriskillzoomers@gmail.com These Terms of Use has been last updated on 21/11/2022. In case of any Cyber Crime and Cyber Contravention involving their accounts, Users alone are responsible to investigate, prosecute and file necessary legal actions and proceedings against the Cyber Criminals and other Offenders and हाजिरीRegister shall in no case be responsible to share the financial and investigation burdens of the User. We will, however, endeavor to support Users in investigating such instances of Cyber Crime, if any, to the best of its ability. Terms and Conditions Forced Logout means Session Out in the हाजिरी Register App… in such situation Associate won’t be able to perform any activity in the हाजिरी Register App. In this हाजिरी Register App Forced Logout Activity arises when the Associate is not active on the हाजिरी Register App last 60mins means Non Active means neither any report is Created or Submitted from the हाजिरी Register App last 60mins. When Associate is Forced Logout from the हाजिरी Register App (as above) …..The हाजिरी Register App notifies the Admin that its Associate is being Forced Logout (red light is ON in Admin’s Timeline) …… On clicking on the Light Admin can either ALLOW or DENY Until and unless the Admin doesn’t clicks on ALLOW Tab, the Associate won’t be able to login in the App. FORCED LOGOUT DETAIL DESCRIPTION Selfie with Site As Associate reaches the Site, his first Activity is login in the हाजिरी Register App and by taking Selfie with Site Associate presence to be marked Associate’s Attendance Forced Logout will happen after 10mins of taking Selfie with Site, if Associate doesn’t start Labor Attendance Labor Attendance Within 10 mins of Selfie with Site Associate will start the Labor Attendance activity and has enter the attendance in next 20mins Upload Attendance After entering the attendance as above Associate has next 20mins to recheck/revise & Upload the Attendance Work Activity After the Attendance is being uploaded, now the timer starts to perform the Activity …. If the Associate doesn’t perform activity in next 60mins , the Associate will be Forced Logout Forced Logout motivates the Associates to engage with company’s work and provide you continuous site reporting via Work Activity Tab. With this tab, Site Reporting can be done by sending Site Images, Site Videos, Audio Messages and also Speech to Text Messages or Comments.
